query: Generate a .env for this Synology media stack. Use APPDATA_ROOT=/volume1/docker/appdata, DATA_ROOT=/volume1/data, TRANSCODE_ROOT=/volume1/docker/transcode, PUID=1026, PGID=100, TZ=America/Chicago. Leave PLEX_CLAIM blank.

Generate a .env file for the stack using APPDATA_ROOT=/volume1/docker/appdata, DATA_ROOT=/volume1/data, TRANSCODE_ROOT=/volume1/docker/transcode, PUID=1000, PGID=1000, TZ=Etc/UTC. Do not include any extra keys.
